childMarkdownRemark.html:
Freeze small animals such as fish in ice-cream containers. You could add blue food colouring for extra effect. Take it out of the container and put it in a washing-up bowl or tray with sides for your child to explore.

Alternatively, freeze blocks of coloured water in various containers. Take them out of the containers and put them in a large bowl of water and watch them melt whilst the colours mix.
